item.description:
The Brettl-Hupfers will be at our lodge in Bartlett, NH enjoying the long weekend and getting in an extra day of skiing! With all the snow we have been getting the conditions should be awesome.

We are about 2 miles from Attitash and close to Wildcat, Bretton Woods, Cranmore, and Black Mountain. Even Sunday River is only about 40 minutes away.

Guests are welcome for $20 per night guest fee. Once you RSVP full directions and information will follow.

Members and guests must be 21+
item.name: Weekend at the Bretts, January 15 - 18th, 2010
